method: In a glass or bowl, add a layer of Greek yogurt.
Top with a layer of granola and then a layer of mixed berries.
Repeat the layers until all ingredients are used.
Drizzle honey over the top and sprinkle with chopped nuts if desired.
serve: Serve immediately as a quick and nutritious breakfast.

ingredients: Optional toppings: cherry tomatoes, poached egg, red pepper flakes, feta cheese
method: Toast the bread slices to your desired level of crispness.
In a small bowl, mash the avocado with a fork. Stir in salt, pepper, and lemon juice.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly over the toasted bread.
Add optional toppings like cherry tomatoes, a poached egg, red pepper flakes, or feta cheese.
serve: Serve immediately as a healthy and filling breakfast.

ingredients: 1/4 cup diced cooked bacon or sausage
method: In a bowl, whisk the eggs with salt and pepper.
Heat butter or oil in a skillet over medium heat. Add the eggs and cook until scrambled.
Lay the tortilla flat and place the scrambled eggs in the center. Top with cheese, bacon or sausage, tomatoes, and bell peppers.
Fold the sides of the tortilla in and roll it up tightly.
Optionally, grill the burrito in the skillet for a few minutes until golden.
serve: Serve with salsa on the side.

ingredients: Toppings: granola, sliced fruit, chia seeds, nuts, honey
method: In a blender, combine the frozen banana, frozen berries, Greek yogurt, and milk or juice. Blend until smooth.
Pour the smoothie into a bowl.
Top with granola, sliced fruit, chia seeds, nuts, and a drizzle of honey.
serve: Enjoy immediately for a refreshing breakfast.

ingredients: 1/4 cup diced vegetables (bell peppers, onions, mushrooms, etc.)
Optional fillings: diced ham, bacon, spinach, etc.
method: In a bowl, whisk the eggs with milk, salt, and pepper.
Heat butter or oil in a skillet over medium heat. Pour in the egg mixture.
As the eggs set, gently pull the edges toward the center, letting uncooked egg flow to the edges.
Once the eggs are almost set, sprinkle cheese and fillings over one half of the omelette.
Fold the omelette in half and cook for another minute, then slide onto a plate.
serve: Serve hot with toast or fresh fruit.
